title: Sample DIH
description: Digital Innovation Hubs are one-stop-shops that help companies to become more competitive with regard to their business/production processes.

website.description: Property. [URL](https://schema.org/URL). Website of the Digital Innovation Hub.

logo.description: Property. [StructuredValue](https://schema.org/StructuredValue). Logo of the Digital Innovation Hub.

address.description: Property. [PostalAddress](https://schema.org/PostalAddress). Address of the Digital Innovation Hub.

representatives.description: Property. [StructuredValue](https://schema.org/StructuredValue). Representatives of the Digital Innovation Hub.

domain.description: Property. [StructuredValue](https://schema.org/StructuredValue). Domain of the Digital Innovation Hub.

competences.description: Property. [StructuredValue](https://schema.org/StructuredValue). Competences of the Digital Innovation Hub.

socialAccounts.description: Property. [StructuredValue](https://schema.org/StructuredValue). SocialAccounts of the Digital Innovation Hub.

relation.description: Property. [StructuredValue](https://schema.org/StructuredValue). Relation of the Digital Innovation Hub.

extra.description: Property. [StructuredValue](https://schema.org/StructuredValue). Extra content of the Digital Innovation Hub.
